text: The Scottish Liberal Democrats (, ) is a political party in Scotland that is part of the British Liberal Democrats. The party's policies usually promote liberalism and progressivism as well as the continuing of Scotland as part of the United Kingdom. In the Scottish Parliament, the party's leader is Alex Cole-Hamilton and the party is an opposition party with 5 out of 129 seats. The party has 4 seats out of 59 Scottish seats in the House of Commons of the United Kingdom. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Liberal parties Category:Liberal Democrats (UK) Category:Political parties in Scotland
title: Scottish Liberal Democrats
